column4: I have a q6600 Intel Quad core. Should I be downloading the 64 bit version of ubuntu? I can't figure out why the 64bit version says AMD
if you have a 64 bit processor you can use the 64 bit version
I think AMD started with 64 bit, so that's why it was originally amd64...
I think you can use up to 4 GB of memory with 32 bit as well though...
I doubt that, as as far as I know it has to be 2^x . iirc it's 4 GB
